Trade/Device Name(s): hema-screen ER XCELTM Enhanced Readability Fecal Occult Blood Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for hema-screen ER XCELTM Enhanced Readability Fecal Occult Blood Test for qualitative detection of fecal occult blood using guaiac-peroxidase reaction
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative detection of occult blood in stool to aid in diagnosing asymptomatic gastrointestinal conditions, for use in hospital testing, colorectal cancer mass screening, and testing of postoperative patients and newborns
